I am a **postdoctoral associate** at the University of Florida’s Institute of Food and Agricultural Sciences ([IFAS](https://ifas.ufl.edu/)).
I use **causal inference**, **spatial analysis**, and **survey-based methods** to evaluate how environmental and regulatory policies shape behavior across space and time. My work links policy design to outcomes in **compliance**, **economic performance**, and **resource conservation**.

:::{.callout-tip}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-12}

**Current focus.** Evaluation of **boating and fishery policies** in Florida’s Nature Coast and the Florida Keys under the [**NOAA RESTORE Act**](https://restoreactscienceprogram.noaa.gov/projects/seagrass-conservation-on-floridas-nature-coast), integrating survey and spatial data to quantify local economic and environmental impacts. Collaboration with the **Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission** on the evaluation of [**Marine Protected Areas**](https://myfwc.com/research/saltwater/wdr/).

**Prior work.** Commercial fishery responses to [**harmful algal blooms**](https://blogs.ifas.ufl.edu/news/2021/08/02/uf-economic-report-details-select-marine-industry-and-tourism-impacts-from-2018-red-tide-event/) in the Gulf of Mexico; policy design for **aquaculture adoption** in Chile.
